member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Graphics.Shared.IZebraImageFactory
member.summary: A factory interface used to acquire a cross platform instance of ZebraImageI.

member.name: M:Zebra.Sdk.Graphics.Shared.IZebraImageFactory.GetImage(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of from the image specified in fullPath.
member.param: The full path of the image.
member.returns: An image formatted for Zebra Printers
member.exception: If the file could not be found, open, or is an unsupported graphic.

member.name: M:Zebra.Sdk.Graphics.Shared.IZebraImageFactory.GetImage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of from the image data specified in imageData.
member.param: A byte[] containing the image data.
member.returns: An image formatted for Zebra Printers.
member.exception: If the file could not be found, open, or is an unsupported graphic.

member.name: M:Zebra.Sdk.Graphics.Shared.IZebraImageFactory.GetImage(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates an instance of from the image data specified in imageData.
member.param: A stream containing the image data.
member.returns: An image formatted for Zebra Printers.
member.exception: If the file could not be found, open, or is an unsupported graphic.

member.name: T:Zebra.Sdk.Graphics.Shared.ZebraImageFactory
member.summary: A factory used to acquire an instance of ZebraImageI.
